text:
誕生日おめでとう
エコー!
style: font-size: 22px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 65.21%;top: 19.77%;width: 26.49%;height: 5.95%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;font-weight: bold;

text:
ありがとう
もう１年
経った?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 81.09%;top: 40.98%;width: 10.98%;height: 7.80%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
友達を
紹介させて
もらえる?
文芸部の
皆よ
